folder: Hone Avenue & Tremont Avenue (East), Bronx, NY
text:
Home Ave., north from but not including East Tremont Ave., to the tracks of the New York, New Haven and Hartford Railroad, showing the walk-bridge spanning the tracks.

August 25, 1935.

P. L. Sperr.

folder: St. Peter's Avenue & Tremont Avenue (East), Bronx, NY
original_title: Bronx: St. Peter's Avenue - Tremont Avenue (East)
text:
(1) St. Peters Ave. (foreground), at the S.W. corner of East Tremont Ave. (right). P. L. Sperr. August 25, 1935.

(2) The same, from a point slightly south of the corner. Note the 1½-story old frame dwelling. P. L. Sperr. August 25, 1935.

folder: St. Peter's Avenue & Tremont Avenue (East), Bronx, NY
original_title: Bronx: St. Peter's Avenue - Tremont Avenue (East)
text:
(1) St. Peters Ave. (foreground), at the S.W. corner of East Tremont Ave. (right). P. L. Sperr. August 25, 1935.

(2) The same, from a point slightly south of the corner. Note the 1½-story old frame dwelling. P. L. Sperr. August 25, 1935.

folder: Tremont Avenue (East & Seddon Street, Bronx, NY
text:
E. Tremont Avenue, at the S. E. corner of Seddon Street, showing an old frame dwelling.

June 22, 1940

P. L. Sperr

folder: Tremont Avenue (East & St. Peter's Avenue, Bronx, NY
original_title: Bronx: Tremont Avenue (East - St. Peter's Avenue
text:
E. Tremont Avenue, east from St. Peters Avenue. The 3-story house (left) is at Lurting Avenue.

June 22, 1940

P. L. Sperr

folder: St. Peter's Avenue & Tremont Avenue (East), Bronx, NY
original_title: Bronx: St. Peter's Avenue - Tremont Avenue (East)
text:
St. Peters Avenue, at the S. W. corner of E. Tremont Avenue (tracks thereon), showing old frame houses.

June 22, 1940

P. L. Sperr

folder: Seddon Street & Tremont Avenue (East), Bronx, NY
text:
Seddon Street, adjoining the S. E. corner of E. Tremont Avenue, showing an ancient frame house, still used as a residence at this date.

June 22, 1940

P. L. Sperr
